response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ["Age (21, young adulthood)", "medium", "Young age is associated with higher risk tendencies, though not definitively determinative on its own."],
    ["Gender (Male)", "high", "Males statistically show higher rates of recidivism, elevating the risk factor."],
    ["Ethnicity (Hispanic)", "low", "Ethnicity in this context does not significantly elevate risk when considered with other factors."],
    ["Criminal history (1 arrest, no conviction)", "medium", "A prior arrest shows contact with law enforcement, though lack of conviction tempers risk."],
    ["Employment (2 jobs held during the year)", "medium", "Some job instability exists, but employment suggests some degree of social integration."],
    ["Education (High school diploma, not in college)", "medium", "A high school diploma provides basic qualifications, though lack of further education can be a moderate risk factor."],
    ["Social support (Living alone, never married)", "medium", "Limited close domestic support can contribute to increased risk."],
    ["Substance use (No drug use in past four years)", "low", "Lack of recent drug use lowers the risk of recidivism associated with substance abuse."],
    ["Mental health (Has not felt depressed over the past month)", "low", "Absence of recent depressive symptoms reduces immediate mental health related risks."],
    ["Family background (Lived with both biological parents in childhood in a stable urban household)", "low", "A stable family background in youth is generally protective against future criminal behavior."],
    ["Spiritual beliefs (Belief that God influences personal life)", "low", "Religious or spiritual beliefs can act as a protective factor against recidivism."]
  ],
  "prediction": "NO",
  "confidence": 70
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 21-year-old male who identifies himself as Hispanic. He has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. He is 5 feet 8 inches and weighs 220 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. He has held 2 jobs during the year. He has not used any drugs in the past four years and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 4, in an urban area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
